TopicTitle: [0.23] DC Aerospace v1.0.5 (RERELEASED- MOVED TO NEW THREAD)

Articles.Content:
The Defcon Corporation Orbital Technology Division has been hard at work designing advanced new modules, with the aim of creating parts to allow space programs to build their own advanced orbital craft- be it a spaceplane, a rocket, or a station, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve got you covered...

If you are looking for more parts to create orbital craft, then you've come to the right place! With DC Aerospace, you can design intricate satellites to put into orbit around anything in the Universe, or to send on deep space missions. Whatever your aim, we can help you get there.

Probe Cores:

Our main range of parts is an entire line of probe cores. We have designed them to match the specific purposes which they were created for, and we currently have two ranges of probes on offer (with more coming soon):

-The Voyager Range-

These probe cores are designed to allow you to conduct deep space missions, and pack many of the essential parts which you would otherwise need to attach to your craft- communications devices, SAS modules, battery packs, instruments... and, of course, the ability to remotely control your vessel. These cores are built around a 1.25m scale.

-The Horizon Range-

These advanced cores are the perfect platform to construct your own space telescopes around- featuring large reflecting chambers, lenses, solar panels, and all of the features of an orbital probe core, you can create fully-functional orbital telescopes within minutes!

We have also designed a wide range of satellite parts to add onto any of the satellite cores, to allow you to design extremely advanced, and compact orbital and/or exploration probes.

You can have this pack for your own space program right now, by going to the official page:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/defcon-corporation-orbital-tech-pack/

A Showcase Of The Mod:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Defcon Corp. Orbital Tech Development:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The pack will soon be available for download on the Spaceport. The Defcon Corporation is working around the clock to provide the best systems possible, and we appreciate feedback, so please give us your thoughts below!

Thank you for your patronage,

EsvDefcon, CEO, Defcon Corporation

Credit:

EsvDefcon- Code, Modeling, Textures

MetalMouth7- Modeling, Textures, Artwork

Deathsoul097- Modeling, Textures

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Disclaimer:

DC Aerospace is a mod which is a collection of parts, which are all original ideas of the authors. We are aiming to create a vast array of high-quality parts for KSP, which are designed to bring exciting new features into your game, and to allow you to build bigger, and better craft. This will remain the sole aim of our mod, and we will not be considering making the mod compatible with other mods until the DC Aerospace mod is at a point at which we are happy with it. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may cause, but please note that this will give us more time to expand the DC Aerospace mod, meaning that we will be able to create parts of a much higher quality.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

I like the engine.

But what size is?

Is more bigger from 2.75m and more smaller from 3.75?

You can add this (DrawGauge) to .cfg :

PROPELLANT

name = Hyperium

ratio = 1.5

DrawGauge = True

}
Yeah, knowing the size would be nice.
